data.name: Rift Bolt
data.oracle_text:
Rift Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.
Suspend 1—{R} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {R} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Risk Factor
data.oracle_text:
Target opponent may have Risk Factor deal 4 damage to them. If that player doesn't, you draw three cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)

data.name: Roil Eruption
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Roil Eruption deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage instead.
data.flavor_text:
"Our feeble villages and tiny encampments stand only at the whim of the Roil."
—*The Invokers' Tales*

data.name: Roiling Terrain
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land, then Roiling Terrain deals damage to that land's controller equal to the number of land cards in that player's graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"The trembling lands ruptured, leaving an open door for things from below to emerge."
—Screed of the Mul Daya

data.name: Rolling Earthquake
data.oracle_text: Rolling Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without horsemanship and each player.

data.name: Sacred Fire
data.oracle_text:
Sacred Fire deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.
Flashback {4}{R}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text:
"Do not confuse justice with mercy."
—Odric, Order of Saint Traft

data.name: Sarkhan's Catharsis
data.oracle_text: Sarkhan's Catharsis deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: "You once brought havoc to my home and ruined my mind. I'm here to return the favor, Bolas."

data.name: Sarkhan's Dragonfire
data.oracle_text:
Sarkhan's Dragonfire deals 3 damage to any target.
Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a red card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
data.flavor_text: "I am most myself when I am least human."

data.name: Sarkhan's Rage
data.oracle_text: Sarkhan's Rage deals 5 damage to any target. If you control no Dragons, Sarkhan's Rage deals 2 damage to you.
data.flavor_text: The people of Tarkir speak of an ancient legend, of the dragon-man called Sarkhan who was greatest of all khans.

data.name: Sauté
data.oracle_text: Sauté deals 3½ damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"Selecting the proper beeble is the key to a good sauté. The pinker the fur and the heartier the yelp, the more succulent the beeble will be when you pop it in your mouth."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar, *The Underworld Cookbook*

data.name: Scent of Cinder
data.oracle_text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

data.name: Scent of Cinder
data.oracle_text: Reveal any number of red cards in your hand. Scent of Cinder deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of cards revealed this way.

data.name: Scorching Lava
data.oracle_text:
Kicker {R} (You may pay an additional {R} as you cast this spell.)
Scorching Lava deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, that creature can't be regenerated this turn and if it would die this turn, exile it instead.

data.name: Scorching Missile
data.oracle_text:
Scorching Missile deals 4 damage to target player or planeswalker.
Flashback {9}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

data.name: Scorching Spear
data.oracle_text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

data.name: Searing Barrage
data.oracle_text:
Searing Barrage deals 5 damage to target creature.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, Searing Barrage deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: It emerged from the coldest depths of Lochmere only to face the fires of Irencrag.

data.name: Searing Blaze
data.oracle_text:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

data.name: Searing Blaze
data.oracle_text:
Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.
Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

data.name: Searing Blood
data.oracle_text: Searing Blood deals 2 damage to target creature. When that creature dies this turn, Searing Blood deals 3 damage to the creature's controller.
data.flavor_text: Purphoros's blessing: sometimes a boon, sometimes a bane. Always ablaze.

data.name: Searing Flesh
data.oracle_text: Searing Flesh deals 7 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: Zemoo found out the hard way that "inflammable" and "flammable" mean the same thing.

data.name: Searing Spear
data.oracle_text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

data.name: Searing Spear
data.oracle_text: Searing Spear deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Sometimes you die a glorious death with your sword held high. Sometimes you're just target practice.

Buyback {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)
Searing Touch deals 1 damage to any target.

data.name: Searing Wind
data.oracle_text: Searing Wind deals 10 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"The first wind of ascension is Forger, burning away impurity."
—*Keld Triumphant*

data.name: Seismic Wave
data.oracle_text: Seismic Wave deals 2 damage to any target and 1 damage to each nonartifact creature target opponent controls.
data.flavor_text: "Step carefully, Imperial. Even the earth rises against you."

data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Shard Volley deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: "Let the mountain's teeth pierce our oppressors."

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: The tools of invention became the weapons of revolution.

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"I love lightning! It's my best invention since the rock."
—Toggo, goblin weaponsmith

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
Lightning tethers souls to the world.
—Kor saying

data.name: Shock
data.oracle_text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"To this day, I have no idea if the heavens were obeying him or attacking him."
—Ral Zarek, research notes

data.name: Shower of Sparks

data.flavor_text: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

data.name: Shrapnel Blast

As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: From trinket to trauma.

data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact.
Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: To the Krark Clan, every artifact has a trigger and a barrel.

data.name: Sickening Dreams
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard X cards.
Sickening Dreams deals X damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: The Patriarch dreams of vile plague.

data.name: Sizzle
data.oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text:
"Of course you should fight fire with fire. You should fight *everything* with fire."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

data.name: Sizzle
data.oracle_text: Sizzle deals 3 damage to each opponent.
data.flavor_text: Explosions ripped through the ship overhead, and those unfortunate enough to be directly below scrambled to find cover.

data.name: Skewer the Critics
data.oracle_text:
Spectacle {R} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
Skewer the Critics deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Going to a Rakdos show is dangerous. Trying to leave early can be fatal.

data.name: Skullcrack
data.oracle_text: Players can't gain life this turn. Damage can't be prevented this turn. Skullcrack deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
data.flavor_text: The lawmage's argument was clever and well reasoned, but Blunk's response proved irrefutable.

data.name: Skull Rend
data.oracle_text: Skull Rend deals 2 damage to each opponent. Those players each discard two cards at random.
data.flavor_text:
"We could never accept anyone with a face that pretty or a mind that sane."
—Nyoser, Gore-House ringleader

data.name: Skullscorch
data.oracle_text: Target player discards two cards at random unless that player has Skullscorch deal 4 damage to them.
data.flavor_text:
"A good whack on the head usually has the same effect."
—Kamahl, pit fighter

data.name: Slagstorm
data.oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each creature.
• Slagstorm deals 3 damage to each player.
data.flavor_text:
"As long as we have the will to fight, we are never without weapons."
—Koth of the Hammer

data.name: Slaying Fire
data.oracle_text:
Slaying Fire deals 3 damage to any target.
Adamant — If at least three red mana was spent to cast this spell, it deals 4 damage instead.
data.flavor_text: The purest virtue burns brighter than the sun and hotter than dragonfire.

data.name: Smash to Smithereens
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
data.flavor_text: The giant Tarvik dreamed that trinkets and machines caused all the world's woe. When he awoke from his troubled sleep, he took the name Tarvik Relicsmasher.

data.name: Smash to Smithereens
data.oracle_text: Destroy target artifact. Smash to Smithereens deals 3 damage to that artifact's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"All of these old relics have one thing in common. Every last one of them is made of smithereens."
—Zada of Slab Haven

data.name: Smiting Helix

Smiting Helix deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
Flashback {R}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
data.flavor_text: Malice is appropriate when vengeance is called for.

data.name: Smoke Spirits' Aid
data.oracle_text: For each of up to X target creatures, create a red Aura enchantment token named Smoke Blessing attached to that creature. Those tokens have enchant creature and "When enchanted creature dies, it deals 1 damage to its controller and you create a Treasure token."

Solar Blast deals 3 damage to any target.

When you cycle Solar Blast, you may have it deal 1 damage to any target.

data.flavor_text: He heard stars and saw thunder.

data.flavor_text: Music scythes the savage beast.

data.oracle_text: Sorin's Vengeance deals 10 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 10 life.
data.flavor_text: "Cherish these last moments. Though your miserable life has come to nothing, I have given it a magnificent end."

Spend only black and/or red mana on X.
Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

data.oracle_text:

Soul Burn deals X damage to any target. You gain life equal to the damage dealt, but not more than the amount of {B} spent on X, the player's life total before the damage was dealt, the planeswalker's loyalty before the damage was dealt, or the creature's toughness.

data.flavor_text: Acolytes of Purphoros hammer the world until they see the sparks of change.

data.flavor_text: It's the only kind of shower goblins will tolerate.

data.name: Spawning Breath

data.flavor_text: Death by death, Kozilek's lineage spread.

data.name: Squall Line
data.oracle_text: Squall Line deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.
data.flavor_text: The constant shifting of Dominaria's shredded timeline played havoc with its atmosphere, combining savage electrical storms from ages past.

data.name: Staggershock
data.oracle_text:
Staggershock deals 2 damage to any target.
Rebound (If you cast this spell from your hand, exile it as it resolves. At the beginning of your next upkeep, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)

data.name: Starfall
data.oracle_text: Starfall deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature is an enchantment, Starfall deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"The most brilliant stars are not born of Nyx."
—Rhexenor, Akroan flamespeaker

data.name: Start from Scratch

Choose one —
• Start from Scratch deals 1 damage to any target.

data.flavor_text: "I don't care what they think!" Rootha snapped. "I know I can do better."

data.name: Steam Blast
data.oracle_text: Steam Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: The viashino knew of the cracked pipes but deliberately left them unmended to bolster the rig's defenses.

data.name: Stench of Evil
data.oracle_text: Destroy all Plains. For each land destroyed this way, Stench of Evil deals 1 damage to that land's controller unless they pay {2}.

data.name: Stoke the Flames

Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

data.name: Stoke the Flames
data.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to any target.

data.name: Stolen Grain
data.oracle_text: Stolen Grain deals 5 damage to target opponent or planeswalker. You gain 5 life.
data.flavor_text: At the battle of Guandu, Cao Cao defeated Yuan Shao by raiding his grain depot, leaving him with no way to feed his troops.

data.name: Stomping Slabs
data.oracle_text: Reveal the top seven cards of your library, then put those cards on the bottom of your library in any order. If a card named Stomping Slabs was revealed this way, Stomping Slabs deals 7 damage to any target.

data.name: Strategy, Schmategy
data.oracle_text:
Roll a six-sided die. Strategy, Schmategy has the indicated effect.
1 — Do nothing.
2 — Destroy all artifacts.
3 — Destroy all lands.
4 — Strategy, Schmategy deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
5 — Each player discards their hand and draws seven cards.
6 — Repeat this process two more times.

data.name: Structural Collapse
data.oracle_text: Target player sacrifices an artifact and a land. Structural Collapse deals 2 damage to that player.
data.flavor_text: The Gruul holiday of Rauck-Chauv always ends the same way.

data.name: Structural Distortion
data.oracle_text: Exile target artifact or land. Structural Distortion deals 2 damage to that permanent's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"As Zendikar has bled, so will Innistrad. As I have wept, so will Sorin."
—Nahiri

data.name: Sudden Shock
data.oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

data.name: Suffocation
data.oracle_text:
Cast this spell only if you were dealt damage this turn by a red instant or sorcery spell.
Suffocation deals 4 damage to the controller of the last red instant or sorcery spell that dealt damage to you this turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

data.name: Sulfurous Blast
data.oracle_text: Sulfurous Blast deals 2 damage to each creature and each player. If you cast this spell during your main phase, Sulfurous Blast deals 3 damage to each creature and each player instead.
data.flavor_text: The Keldons used the toxic vents in the cracked earth to bolster their home's defenses.

data.name: Surging Flame
data.oracle_text:
Ripple 4 (When you cast this spell, you may reveal the top four cards of your library. You may cast spells with the same name as this spell from among those cards without paying their mana costs. Put the rest on the bottom of your library.)
Surging Flame deals 2 damage to any target.

data.name: Syphon Soul
data.oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
data.flavor_text: As Phage drank their energy, a vague memory of Jeska stirred. Then she lost herself again in the joy of her victims' suffering.

data.name: Syphon Soul
data.oracle_text: Syphon Soul deals 2 damage to each other player. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
data.flavor_text:
"Her lips suck forth; see, where it flies!"
—Christopher Marlowe, *The Tragical History of Doctor Faustus*

data.name: Tarfire
data.oracle_text: Tarfire deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"After Auntie brushed the soot from her eyes, she discovered something wonderful: the fire had turned the goat into something that smelled delicious."
—A tale of Auntie Grub

data.name: Taste of Blood
data.oracle_text: Taste of Blood deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and you gain 1 life.
data.flavor_text:
"How blessed are some people, whose lives have no fears, no dreads, to whom sleep is a blessing that comes nightly, and brings nothing but sweet dreams."
—Bram Stoker, *Dracula*

data.name: Thunderblade Charge
data.oracle_text:

Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, if Thunderblade Charge is in your graveyard, you may pay {2}{R}{R}{R}. If you do, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.

—Aurelia

data.name: Warleader's Helix
data.oracle_text: Warleader's Helix deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
data.flavor_text:
"There is no time to remedy our enemies' ignorance. Blast it out of them."
—Aurelia

data.name: Weight of Spires
data.oracle_text: Weight of Spires deals damage to target creature equal to the number of nonbasic lands that creature's controller controls.
data.flavor_text:
"Finally, a good use for an Azorius courthouse."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

data.name: Wet Willie of the Damned
data.oracle_text: Wet Willie of the Damned deals 2½ damage to any target and you gain 2½ life.
data.flavor_text: Ever the warrior, Glissa responded with a "wedgie from beyond Uranus."

data.name: Wild Slash
data.oracle_text:
Ferocious — If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, damage can't be prevented this turn.
Wild Slash deals 2 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text: Never mistake deception for cleverness.

data.name: Winter Sky
data.oracle_text: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, Winter Sky deals 1 damage to each creature and each player. If you lose the flip, each player draws a card.

data.name: Wizard's Lightning
data.oracle_text:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if you control a Wizard.
Wizard's Lightning deals 3 damage to any target.
data.flavor_text:
"The study of magic began when the first mage taught herself to throw lightning."
—Naban, dean of iteration

data.name: Word of Blasting
data.oracle_text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's mana value to the Wall's controller.

data.name: Word of Blasting
data.oracle_text: Destroy target Wall. It can't be regenerated. Word of Blasting deals damage equal to that Wall's mana value to the Wall's controller.
data.flavor_text:
"Walls? What walls?"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

data.name: Xenagos's Strike
data.oracle_text: Xenagos's Strike deals 4 damage to each player.

data.name: Yamabushi's Flame
data.oracle_text: Yamabushi's Flame deals 3 damage to any target. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.

data.name: Zap
data.oracle_text:
Zap deals 1 damage to any target.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: "All this time I thought Squee was useless," chuckled Sisay. "Who knew he'd be such a good shot?"

data.name: Zenith Flare
data.oracle_text: Zenith Flare deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of cards with a cycling ability in your graveyard.
data.flavor_text:
"I defy this world to try our defenses now. Send pterons and skycats. Send Vadrok!"
—Janae, Coppercoat architect
